name: Maria Postcards
description: Early astronomers mistook the dark patches on the moon for seas. These fine art, hand printed postcards are based on these moon maps. - 4 Pack - Limited edition, hand-numbered - Gocco-printed fine art postcards - Beta Neon, Black on Craft - Multipack including Beta Neon, Black on Kraft, Rose Blue on White, and Rose Blue on Kraft BY ISA GAGARIN OF GIBBOUS GOODS

name: Talhakimt Necklace
description: A wild, stand alone necklace, available in 2 distinct colorways. Red Talhakimt pendant (1900’s): - African trade beads: prayer beads, glass snake vertebrae beads, orange white hearts, vinyl beads, venetian seed beads - Grossular garnet – for bringing your visions into reality - Pink coral – to allow for the good the true and the beautiful - Carnelian – for the willingness to take risks - Tri-cut seed beads, s.s. crimp beads, softflex - Approximately 26” - Edition of 6 Blue Glass Talhakimt Pendant (1900’s): - African trade beads: glass snake vertebrae, yellow squash beads, red interlocking beads, vinyl spacer beads - Pink coral – to allow for the good the true and the beautiful - Citrine – for clarity and divine imagination - Tri-cut seed beads, s.s. crimp beads, softflex - Approximately 26” - Edition of 6 BY EMILY TEMTE "Talhakimt pendants were made in Czechoslovakia and exported to West Africa. The Tuareg people in Mauritania and Mali used them as amulets and hair adornments. The pendants used in this this piece date back to the early 1900’s. Due to their age and handmade nature the shape and size will vary slightly. Some have small chips or cracks due to vintage age and use. Be good to them as they are quite fragile."

name: Porcelain Hand Earrings
description: Was $65 Whether you've been caught red handed, have cold hands, or you were simply born with porcelain skin, these earrings will look great waving from below your ears. No two are alike. - Hand cast porcelain hands. - Oxidized sterling silver chain and findings - Hangs about 2.5" from ear (white usually hangs about 3") - Blue glaze with iolite or apatite stone detail - Red glaze with turquoise stone detail - Clear glaze with iolite or apatite stone detail * These earrings are part of the Permanent Collection and are hand made to order. Please allow 2 weeks for your entire order to be filled. BY ERIN SMITH

name: Calico Peyote Stitch Necklace
description: A lightweight, wearable necklace with a subtle combination of color in a psychedelic camouflage pattern. - Hand woven with 400+ seed beads in ivory, gold, tan, and pale translucent yellow seed beads - Pendant - 1.5" x 2" - Approximately 25" around - No clasp, fits over the head - Edition of 5, each with unique pattern BY ANNA WEBER "Each necklace is woven together one bead at a time, off loom, with a single thread and needle. I use a variety of translucent, matte, and glossy beads to create the slight illusion of depth. No two are alike!"

name: Window Moon
description: A beautiful addition to any window: a hand drawn moon. A perfectly romantic gift for that dreamy special someone. - Embroidery hoop, drawing on carbon paper, chain and hook - Dimensions vary, average hoop 5" diameter - Edition of 5 BY ISA NEWBY GAGARIN "When the moon's in the sky, like a big pizza pie, that's amoré. My practice is often centered on making carbon transfer drawings. The carbon paper sheets that I use to transfer a drawing usually end up taped to the windows in my studio. They look surreal illuminated from the back by daylight. Each window moon is a unique, one-of-a-kind drawing."

name: Two Porcelain Lace Lights
description: Set of 2 small, slip caste porcelain tea light holders. Lace was soaked in porcelain and carefully laid over each form so that every piece has a unique lace overlay. - Off-white, with varying lace detail - Approximately 2 1/4" height, and 2" diameter - Edition of 5 BY ERIN SMITH

name: Urban Jungle Scarf
description: Warm and stylish, the ultimate combination. This handwoven scarf features our favorite colors, and will add interest to any cold weather outfit. - 100% wool in chartreuse, gold & black - Approximately 9.5" x 60" - Hand wash in cold water with mild detergent, lay flat to dry - Edition of 5 BY BETH CHEKOLA "Each scarf is hand woven on a 4-harness loom using overshot – a weaving process in which the warp threads 'float' creating a more 3-dimensional pattern than traditional weaving. The pattern was found in an old book in the University Archives, and is listed at the time as being hung in the Philadelphia Museum of Art."

name: Notch Necklace
description: This is a great stand-alone necklace, or a good layering piece. Commemorate how many years you've been together, or move to something classier than notches on the bed post! This could be her favorite necklace... - 20" gold-filled chain - Gold filled findings - Coral detail on closure - Handmade brass pendants - Edition of 5 BY ERIN SMITH * This item comes made to order, please specify how many "notches" you would like in the comments when ordering. Slight cost increase for additional years, see pricing at checkout.

name: Golden Triangle Threaded Studs
description: Just the right amount of gold. A gift for yourself or that special someone... - Hand cut 14kt yellow gold triangle posts on a sterling silver box chain which threads thru the ear - Satin finish on the triangle, high shine on the chain for a delicate sparkle - Long! These hang approximately 5 inches from the ear BY ANNIKA KAPLAN * This item is made to order within 3 weeks. Please note that your entire order will ship within this time.

name: Favorites Necklace
description: A kaleidoscopic collection in the form of a necklace. - Hand beaded with African trade beads, brass, red & orange white heart beads, pink glass, recycled glass, vinyl, and Bali silver spacers - Stones featured are faceted lapis lazuli, faceted pyrite, freshwater pearl & pink coral - Hanging from brass chain, brass snap clasp, sterling silver wire - Inner loop hangs 23”, the outer loop hangs 26” - Edition of 5 BY EMILY TEMTE “This necklace was so fun to make! This is what happens when I decide to break out some of my most favorite beads and use them instead of hiding them away.” Lapis Lazuli – For Royalty. Pyrite – For Clarity & Taking Action. Freshwater Pearl – For Grounding. Pink Coral – To Restore Harmony To The Heart.

name: Asymmetrical Beaded Necklace
description: A perfectly modern piece with just enough color. - Glass, bone, and seed beads - Antique brass clasp strung on strong flex wire - 12" drop - Edition of 5 BY dullDiamond "We wanted to make something simple yet poetic, irreverent yet beautiful."

name: Finger Tipped Necklace
description: This necklace will lay a finger or two on you! The spacing of the fingers are just so... Wear it with bright coral-orange nails out, or in, for a special wink of color. - Hand-drawn and etched copper fingerprints - Sterling silver chain and findings - Coral bead detail - Hand painted metal enamel color - 20" chain - Edition of 5 BY ERIN SMITH "Each finger started out a flat sheet of copper that I etched hand-drawn fingerprints on. From there, each piece was formed using a special mold, and soldered into a 3 dimensional finger. In the end, I get to paint each fingernail, like a best friend!"
